channel.title: Giampaolo Rodola - rant
channel.description: Python enthusiast, core developer, psutil author

item.title: Goodbye Google Code, I am moving to GitHub
item.description: 8 years ago I started hosting my first open source project (pyftpdlib) on Google Code and I later ended up also hosting psutil and pysendfile. Back then GC had just been released and similarly to other Google products I appreciated the clean and minimalistic interface, the excellent bug tracker and â€¦
item.dc:creator: Giampaolo Rodola
